zi_product_Price_CompValueTooltip1Adobe: "Comp. Value" prices are based on the prices of comparable items offered for sale on Zazzle.com and elsewhere in the market.
zi_product_Price_CompValueTooltip2Adobe: These comparisons consider a number of factors, including product materials and features, fulfillment time, available customization options, and product quality which may result in price increases for seemingly-similar products.

zi_checkout_Cart_ItemsNotEditable_Descri: To change the design of your product, remove the product from your cart, make your edits, and add the edited product back to your cart.

zi_checkout_EasyPost_NoMatch_UnknownErro: Please double check the address you entered to ensure timely delivery.
zi_checkout_Error_OutOfDate: It looks like your cart is out of date.
zi_checkout_Error_UpdateOrder: Please update your order and try again.
zi_checkout_NoMethodsErrorUnknown: One or more of the products in this shipment cannot be shipped to the specified address.
zi_checkout_PaymentGiftCertificateDialog: Promotion codes may not be combined with any other Zazzle promotional or volume discount offers. If a volume discount applies to your order, you will receive either the discount set forth in the offer or the standard volume discount, whichever is greater. An order may not qualify for the following reasons:
The order may not have met the minimum price threshold
The items in your cart may not qualify for that discount
The items are sold by a 3rd party and are not labeled as "Sold by Zazzle"
A greater discount such as volume discount has already been applied to that item
The discount is on shipping which will only be displayed in checkout
zi_checkout_Payments_ZeroBalanceWarning: To ensure this is a valid use of your account, we require a credit card to authorize your order. Your credit card will NOT be charged.
zi_checkout_QAS_Warning_MatchesFound: Hmm...we are unable to verify your address as entered, but found a close match. Please confirm the address you want to use to ensure timely delivery.
zi_checkout_QAS_Warning_ValidatedAddress: zMail postcards requires USPS verified addresses.
zi_checkout_Summary_FreeLong: Your order is free. No payment is required.
zi_checkout_Summary_UpdateBillingError: We're sorry. We were unable to update the billing address. Please try again.
zi_checkout_Summary_UpdateShippingSingle: We're sorry. We were unable to update the shipping address. Please try again.

zi_product_PDP_PrintingProcess_ClassicPr: No white base layer is printed on the fabric, any white used in the design will come across as transparent allowing the color of the fabric to show through.
zi_product_PDP_PrintingProcess_VividPrin: Fabric is treated with a white base layer under the design, allowing the design to be more vibrant. Extra production step may require a surcharge.

Body Sizes

  • Chest: Lift arms and wrap tape measure around chest. Place at widest part and pull firmly. Put arms down for most accurate measurement.
  • Waist: Wrap the tape measure around your waist at the narrowest point.
  • Hips: Wrap the tape measure around the widest part of your hips and pull firmly.

Product Measurements

  • Width: Measure T-shirt from arm hole to arm hole.
  • Length: Measure T-shirt from the seam at the neck to the bottom of the garment.
